name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-msgext-message-reminder-nodejs
title: Message reminder with messaging extension action
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates a Node.js Messaging Extension that allows users to schedule tasks and receive reminder cards in Microsoft Teams.
longDescription: This Node.js sample showcases a Messaging Extension where users can schedule tasks directly from messages and receive reminders at specified times. It provides a seamless way for users to manage their tasks and stay organized within Microsoft Teams.
